title: Supplier Import
subtitle: Upload an Excel sheet and the system will match or create supplier records automatically.

upload.title: Upload Excel File
upload.description: Select a properly formatted Excel file containing supplier data
upload.templateDescription: Download the required template file for proper formatting
upload.supportedFormats: Supports .xls / .xlsx files. Fields marked with * are required.
upload.importNote: Existing suppliers are updated in place; missing profile data is filled without overwriting valid details.

vendorCode.label: Vendor Code / Supplier Code *
vendorCode.note: Must be unique; used to match supplier records.

address.label: Address1 / Address2
address.note: Registered address. Use Address2 for extra lines.

summary.title: Import summary
summary.passwordHint: Newly created or reset supplier accounts appear below with their default password (defaults to 666666 unless configured). Share it securely and ask suppliers to change it after signing in.

errors.title: Errors
errors.hint: Fix the rows above in your Excel file and run the import again.

notifications.sessionExpired: Session expired. Please sign in again.

errors.fileRequired: Please select a file to import
errors.invalidFormat: Invalid file format. Please use the provided template.
